item.title: The Chain Of Responsibility Pattern
item.description: What is a Chain Of Responsibility Pattern? The Chain Of Responsibility Pattern helps create a chain of objects to examine requests. Each object in turn examines a request and either handles it or passes onto the next object in the chain. Source What problems does it solve? The Chain Of Responsibility Pattern (CoR) helps solve following problems: Dynamic Request Handling: It enables dynamic assignment of responsibilities at runtime.
